alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 9:59AM EST until March 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Erie, Lorain and Huron counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Steady snow will continue through the afternoon but will struggle to stick to paved surfaces outside of any briefly heavier bursts. While snow will be lighter by this evening the potential for slick road conditions may increase as the sun sets and temperatures fall below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
